name: Project: Second Earth Demo
detailed_description:
Earth From Another Sun is a FPS-Looter developed by Multiverse.
At first we only wanted to port the VR version of our game Seeking Dawn on to PC. But after working for some time on the porting, we realized that we would need to rework most of it so that it can become a really enjoyable game. That's why we put up together a new development team, started working on a new story, a new gameplay, a better level design, and a lot more!

We are currently running the first Alpha test which is our very first playable build; therefore, we want to share with you a very basic gameplay demo so that we can hear what you really think about the game and art style.


Story Background
In 2079, while people were enjoying the New Year’s Eve in family, a planet suddenly appeared out of a black hole and broke into Earth orbit. Same atmosphere and topology as The Earth, lots of familiar places were, only in a moment, put just in front of humanity eyes... The Joint Space Agency and The Universal Capital of the World's Most Famous Colony started fighting for the unknown planet resources. While fighting and exploring this new astronomical object, they found out that the environment was suitable for human beings, they discovered ruins of cities that are very similar to human architecture and... they also found a strange pathway that leads to anywhere in the galaxy cluster...

Gameplay：
- Immersive narration
- Looter-Shooter
- Exploration, puzzle solving and interactive environment
